Function Utils::info¶

  • Defined in File Utils_CPU_info.hh

Function Documentation¶

void Utils::info(bool &bMMX, bool &bMMXplus, bool &bSSE, bool &bSSE2, bool &bSSE3, bool &bSSSE3, bool &bSSE41, bool &bSSE42, bool &bSSE4a, bool &bSSE5, bool &b3Dnow, bool &b3DnowExt)¶

Get info of Intel CPU

Parameters

  • bMMX – [out] booelan, support MMX instruction set

  • bMMXplus – [out] booelan, support MMXplus instruction set

  • bSSE – [out] booelan, support SSE instruction set

  • bSSE2 – [out] booelan, support SSE2 instruction set

  • bSSE3 – [out] booelan, support SSE3 instruction set

  • bSSSE3 – [out] booelan, support SSEE3 instruction set

  • bSSE41 – [out] booelan, support SSE41 instruction set

  • bSSE42 – [out] booelan, support SSE42 instruction set

  • bSSE4a – [out] booelan, support SSE4a instruction set

  • bSSE5 – [out] booelan, support SSE5 instruction set

  • b3Dnow – [out] booelan, support 3Dnow instruction set

  • b3DnowExt – [out] booelan, support 3DnowExt instruction set
